channel.title: Fatality 614 (help)
channel.description:
[s][b]Hey Mopar,[/b] [i]I'm currently coding at my client, almost done [b]BUT[/b][/i] [i]I played Fatality 614 before it went down. I noticed they had a different .bat file, which runs on a, lets call it, 'multi option' codes in it.[/i] [i]It detected automatically the homedrive, then it found out in which path the java/bin were.[/i]
This is what i need ;)
Thx, help would be much appreciated
**btw. don't mind the bad grammar, I'm tired atm.[/s]
Fixed it myself, Thx anyways

item.title: Fatality 614 (help)
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[s]Hey Mopar,
I’m currently coding at my client, almost done BUT
I played Fatality 614 before it went down. I noticed they had a different .bat file, which runs on a, lets call it, ‘multi option’ codes in it.
It detected automatically the homedrive, then it found out in which path the java/bin were.

This is what i need

Thx, help would be much appreciated

**btw. don’t mind the bad grammar, I’m tired atm.[/s]

Fixed it myself, Thx anyways

Read full topic
